The video has been viewed over 171: 000 times and shared over 2,400 times on Facebook since its publication on October 15, 2019.
The video consists of two different clip: one showing men being beaten up and the other showing the body of a dead boy placed in an ice-filled Styrofoam box.
Official statements from the Sinan count: 2017, in Sanjiaoba village, Guizhou province, during an incident involving individuals mistaken for fraudsters and thieves, not child abductors.
